item.title: I am a Freelancer This does not mean i will work for free
item.description: Yes I am a freelancer, Yes i work from home, Yes i work hard to make money but some people unnecessary ask for extra work , some people ask for free courses , some people ask for free stuffs. I am a freelancer but this doesnâ€™t mean i will work for free. I have bills just like you. I pay hefty rent , I pay for internet , I pay for themes .
